semantics.label: Show start screen
semantics.description: If checked, the content will show the title screen when starting.

fields.label: Marker image (original)
fields.description: Upload the image that you want to create a marker for. Should be a square image or it will be cropped. Keep in mind that you will need a unique marker image for every interaction.

importantDescription.description:
Please keep in mind some criteria for good marker images:
  • High color contrast, ideally black and white
  • Asymmetry
  • The internal resolution of a marker is 16 x 16 pixels, using larger images can make marker detection worse
  • Single characters or short words yield good results

fields.label: Marker image (pattern)
fields.description: Download this image to use as a marker displayed on a screen or printed on paper.

fields.label: Action type
fields.description: Action that should be triggered when the marker is found.

fields.label: 3D model file
fields.description: Upload a glTF (.glb / .gltf) file here. The preferred format is "glTF 2.0 binary" in a single file.

fields.label: Scale
fields.description: Scale the model up or down to match your marker size.

fields.label: Position
fields.description: Set the model's offset position relative to the marker.

semantics.label: Show end screen
semantics.description: If checked, show an end screen when all interactions have been completed. The end screen will not be available if you only use 3D models though.

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: Enable "Retry" button
fields.description: If checked, learners can retry the task.

fields.label: Enable "Solutions" button
fields.description: If checked, learners can view the solutions of all interactions.

fields.label: Override "Show Solution" button
fields.description: This option allows to enable or disable the "Show Solution" button for all contents or to use their respective behavioural settings.

fields.label: Override "Retry" button
fields.description: This option allows to enable or disable the "Retry" button for all contents or to use their respective behavioural settings.

fields.label: Fallback height
fields.description: Set a fallback heigth in px for cases when there are cross orgin resource sharing (CORS) issues.
